    • Field Detail

      • LOGICAL_LINE_AT_CURSOR

        public static final DataKey<java.lang.Integer> LOGICAL_LINE_AT_CURSOR
        The key to retrieve a logical editor line position of a latest actionable click inside the gutter. Available to gutter popup actions (see setGutterPopupGroup(ActionGroup), GutterIconRenderer.getPopupMenuActions(), TextAnnotationGutterProvider.getPopupActions(int, Editor))

      • ICON_CENTER_POSITION

        public static final DataKey<java.awt.Point> ICON_CENTER_POSITION
        The key to retrieve a editor gutter icon center position of a latest actionable click inside the gutter. Available to gutter popup actions (see setGutterPopupGroup(ActionGroup), GutterIconRenderer.getPopupMenuActions(), TextAnnotationGutterProvider.getPopupActions(int, Editor))
